title: Showboy reportedly arrested over allegations of blackmailing music executive Davido GH
desc: Ghanaian entertainer Sam Kwabena Safo Junior, known as Showboy, has reportedly been arrested by the CID over alleged blackmail targeting music executive Davido GH. Read more.

title: Can Food Be Art? Denmark Is Finding Out.
desc: High-level chefs in the country could become eligible for arts funding under a new initiative. Not all in the art and culinary worlds are raising a glass to the idea, though.

title: ICC Announces Match Officials for T20 World Cup 2026

title: Carlos Alcaraz on recovery for Australian Open final
desc: Carlos Alcaraz had to rouse every last ounce of energy to overcome Alexander Zverev on Friday in an Australian Open classic.

title: PS Ouma Oluga calls for equity and trust in oral healthcare reforms
desc: Dr. Oluga observed that despite the Association’s 65-year presence, dental services remain out of reach for millions of Kenyans, a reality he said has been underscored by recent preventable incidents pointing to deeper systemic shortcomings.

title: Senate funding deal; Minnesota; Georgia ballots : NPR
desc: Border czar Tom Homan has suggested possibly pulling some federal immigration agents out of Minnesota. And, Senate leaders struck a short-term funding deal to keep most of the government running.

title: Surge in childhood stomach illness alarms Western Cape health authorities
desc: The Red Cross War Memorial Children’s Hospital, has recorded a worrying rise in cases of gastroenteritis.

title: Breakdown in cricket relations with Bangladesh rings alarm bells for India’s Olympic bid
desc: Bangladesh’s withdrawal from the men’s T20 World Cup has caused concern, with the IOC unlikely to award the 2036 Games to India if there is a risk of a boycott

title: South Africa expels top Israeli diplomat
desc: Ariel Siedman has been given 72 hours to leave South Africa, the foreign affairs ministry says.
